title: Contribute my project "CodeAura"
body: **CodeAura** is a custom IDE code editor built with the MERN stack for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development.
author: noobrehan18

comments.body:
An innovative idea but

🛑 Remove the `node_modules` folder. 
- This folder is only for environment building locally and **NOT to be pushed on Git or GitHub**
- This can be automated by adding a `.gitignore` file in your project with all such ignored folders and files listed

Also Recheck the PR for any other problems
please assign me this issue under gssoc-ext and hactoberfest level2 so that i can start working immediately.
The `node_modules` folder is still there. It has to be removed.
